remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此项目或给定的项目根提供源项目文件的完整路径，此项目添加到全局项目集合中。This project is added to the global project collection when either this project or the given project root is given the full path to the source project file. 如果在计算失败时，将引发 InvalidProjectFileException。Throws InvalidProjectFileException if the evaluation fails. 如果已存在一个等效的项目，则会引发 InvalidOperationException 加载项目集合中。Throws InvalidOperationException if there is already an equivalent project loaded in the project collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在第二个评估阶段读取项元数据。Item metadata is read during the second evaluation pass. 与不同 ItemDefinitions 属性返回的元数据，此元数据的排序，并包含随后使用相同的名称和项类型重写任何元数据。Unlike metadata returned by the ItemDefinitions property, this metadata is ordered, and includes any metadata subsequently overridden with the same name and item type.

value.span: 返回可枚举在计算过程中遇到的所有项的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator over all items encountered during evaluation.

value.span: 在进行第三轮计算时读取这些项。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同的项属性返回这些项，这些是相对于计算，而不仅仅是相对于同一项类型的项排序过程中遇到的所有其他项进行排序。Unlike those items returned by the Items property, these are ordered with respect to all other items encountered during evaluation, not just ordered with respect to items of the same item type. 某些应用程序，在此完整相互排序非常重要，并且此类主机可以使用此属性。In some applications, this complete mutual ordering is significant, and such hosts can use this property. 枚举不包括其条件计算结果不为 true 时，任何元素，也不包括自上次计算以后添加任何项。The enumeration does not include any elements whose conditions did not evaluate to true, nor does it include any items added since the last evaluation.

summary.span: 获取某些属性的可能值的集合，这些属性用于计算有关属性、属性组、导入和时间的条件。

span.span: Gets a collection of possible property values for properties used to evaluate conditions found on properties, property groups, imports, and whens.

value.span: 返回某些属性的可能值的集合，这些属性用于计算有关属性、属性组、导入和时间的条件。

span.span: Returns a collection of possible property values for properties used to evaluate conditions found on properties, property groups, imports, and whens.

value.span: 该集合采用规范格式。

span.span: The collection is in canonical form.

value.span: 条目的名称是要计算的属性的名称，值是可能的属性值的列表。

span.span: The name of the entry is the name of the property to be evaluated, and the value is a list of possible property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，如果在项目中的属性上存在以下条件： Condition="'$(Configuration)|$（平台） '= =' 调试|x 86"Condition="'$(Configuration) = = 发布"表会填充有 {"配置"，{"调试"和"发布"}} {"平台"，{"x86"}} Visual Studio 使用此集合来确定在项目中定义的配置For example, if the following conditions existed on properties in a project: Condition="'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)' == 'Debug|x86'" Condition="'$(Configuration)' == 'Release'" the table would be populated with { "Configuration", { "Debug", "Release" }} { "Platform", { "x86" }} This collection is used by Visual Studio to determine the configurations defined in the project

summary.span: 基于此项目创建一个项目实例，但将此项目与创建的项目实例完全断开连接。

span.span: Creates a project instance based on this project, but completely disconnected from it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很少需要显式调用此方法，因为所有编辑均会影响项目会自动将其都标记为已修改。It is seldom necessary to call this method explicitly, because all edits affecting a project automatically mark it as modified. 但是，有时，必须调用此方法。Sometimes, however, this method must be called. 例如，项目可能具有其条件取决于磁盘存在的文件的导入元素。For example, a project may have an Import element whose condition depends on a file that exists on a disk. 如果在评估时，该文件不存在，并且创建评估后，则项目必须显式标记为已修改。If that file does not exist at evaluation time, and it is created after evaluation, then the project must be explicitly marked as modified. 方法使用此属性来确定是否需要执行评估。The method uses this property to determine if an evaluation is necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果包含的项的项组变为空，则也将其删除。If the item group containing the item becomes empty, it is also removed. 如果项源自于的通配符或之间用分号分隔的表达式，表达式首先展开为多个项。If the item originates from a wildcard or semicolon-separated expression, the expression is first expanded into multiple items. 该项目进行了更新而重新计算之后才会进行任何进一步评估。The project is updated, but no further evaluation occurs until reevaluation. 例如，如果项的类型为"i"，删除"j"从评估"@(i)"重新计算之后才不会对其进行修改。For example, if an item of type "i" is removed, "j" which is evaluated from "@(i)" is not modified until reevaluation.
